resources.string: Who first buy car na him buy old model.
Guy wey no follow you suffer no suppose follow you carry casket.
No mind hype man, if you don get money problem don finish
I don get sponge, abeg cut soap for me.
Na who cut maize for me I go amaze.
Try dey code yourself, some niggas get money pass your client.
Battery wey full go still low, battery wey low go still full. Our prayers be say make our charger no spoil!
When dem say make you hustle hard, no be buy strength oh, even Dangote no fit carry bag of cement.
Person wey dey find money no dey off data.
Anybody can gbera anytime, no dey block road.
One email fit make you a millionaire, no doubt am.
All man for himself, everybody on God.
Follow who knows road, but hold you T.Fare.
Egungun be careful, nah express you dey go.
